title: Google\Cloud\Optimization\V1\Shipment\Load
name: Load
description:
When performing a visit, a predefined amount may be added to the vehicle load if it's a pickup, or subtracted if it's a delivery. This message defines such amount. See [load_demands][google.cloud.optimization.v1.Shipment.load_demands].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.optimization.v1.Shipment.Load

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.amount
params.description: The amount by which the load of the vehicle performing the corresponding visit will vary. Since it is an integer, users are advised to choose an appropriate unit to avoid loss of precision. Must be ≥ 0.

methods.name: getAmount
methods.description:
The amount by which the load of the vehicle performing the corresponding visit will vary. Since it is an integer, users are advised to choose an appropriate unit to avoid loss of precision. Must be ≥ 0.
